summary: Contoso Wireless offers a high-speed internet product that comes with a number of special features, including parental control, unlimited data, and 24/7 customer support. Customers can take advantage of a 50% discount on their first month when signing up for a 12-month contract. Additionally, customers should make sure to have virus protection installed on their devices and set up a Wi-Fi password for security. The service can be signed up for online at www.contosowireless.com or by calling 1-800-CONTOSO.
